descricao: Luxo e esportividade alemã, com um motor potente e design marcante.

Miliage: 107,000 km / Engine: 3.0L V6, DOHC, naturally aspirated / Chassis: All-aluminum monocoque (first production car to do so) / Front Suspension: Double wishbone / Rear Suspension: Double wishbone / Brakes: Ventilated discs (front & rear) / 0-100 km/h (0-62 mph): ~5.7 seconds / Top Speed: ~270 km/h (168 mph)

Mileage: 75,100km / Engine: 3.0L 2JZ Twin Turbo variant /  Rz Turbo Engine / Getrag 6-speed Transmission Swap / RZ Brakes / TRD 320 Km/h Speedometer / TE37V Wheels / HKS 3.1L kit/ T51R Turbo/ External Wastegate / High-lift Camshafts / F-CON V Pro Version 3.2 Engine Management / Fuel Collector Tank / Exhaust Manifold / Ikeya Formula Full Front Arms / Front Suspension: Double wishbone /Rear Suspension: Double wishbone / Brakes: Ventilated discs (front & rear) / Tires (stock): 235/45R17 (front), 255/40R17 (rear) /0-100 km/h (0-62 mph): ~4.9 seconds / Top Speed: ~250 km/h (155 mph) [factory limited]

Mileage: 32,100 km / Engine: 2.6L RB26 Twin Turbo 2600cc / Transmition: 6-speed manual / Curb weigh of around 1560kg /Upgraded aero (carbon fiber rear diffuser) / Improved suspension tuning / Active rear LSD / Optional N1 turbos (on some variants) for track use /Lower ride height than base GT-R / Brakes: Brembo 4-pot front / 2-pot rear calipers/ 0-100 km/h (0-62 mph): ~4.9 seconds / Top Speed: ~250 km/h (155 mph) [factory limited]

Mileage: 125,000 km / Engine: 1.3L Twin turbo rotary engine 1300cc / Suspension: Independent multi-link / Brakes: Ventilated discs (front & rear) / Tires: 235/45R17 (front & rear on Type R) / 0-100 km/h (0-62 mph): ~5.0 seconds / Top Speed: ~250 km/h (155 mph)

Mileage: 173,000 km / Engine: 2.0L flat-4 (Boxer), DOHC, turbocharged, intercooled                   / Front Suspension: MacPherson strut / Rear Suspension: MacPherson strut / Brakes: Ventilated discs (front & rear) / Tires: 205/50R16 (standard), upgraded in RA and STI versions / 0-100 km/h (0-62 mph): ~5.2 seconds / Top Speed: ~240 km/h (149 mph)

Miliage: 58,000km / Engine: 2.0L inline-4, DOHC, turbocharged and intercooled / Front Suspension: MacPherson strut / Rear Suspension: Multi-link / Brakes: Brembo ventilated discs front and rear / 0-100 km/h (0-62 mph): ~4.7–5.0 seconds / Top Speed: ~240–250 km/h (149–155 mph)

Miliage: 63,000km / Engine: 3.0L V6, DOHC, twin-turbocharged and intercooled / Front Suspension: Multi-link / Rear Suspension: Multi-link / Brakes: Ventilated disc brakes (front & rear) / Tires (stock): Front: 225/50R16 Rear: 245/45R16 / Front: 225/50R16 / Rear: 245/45R160-100 km/h (0-62 mph): ~5.6 seconds / Top Speed: ~250 km/h (155 mph, electronically limited)

Miliage: 34,000km / Engine: 2.5L inline-6 DOHC, twin-turbo (single turbo from late 1996 onward)/ Front Suspension: Independent strut / Rear Suspension: Multi-link / Brakes: Ventilated discs (front and rear) / LSD (Limited Slip Differential): Available (standard on Tourer V) / 0–100 km/h (0–62 mph): Approx. 6.0–6.5 seconds (manual) / Top Speed: Electronically limited to 180 km/h (111 mph) in Japan
